website_summaries.verdict: Purchase this gift basket if you want a versatile gift with so much variety that it's bound to please every sort of palate.
pros: Stands out for its impressive variety that includes a wide array of snacks, from candy to cookies to cheese
cons: Contents of the basket are likely to vary, which may concern some consumers who prefer to know exactly what to expect

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Product Description
customer_reviews.text: I relied on the listing of products to determine which basket to purchase as a gift. Unfortunately, only 4/16 listed items were included in the basket. I was aware that the picture and product description did not match, but I expected the product listing to be accurate. We did receive some of the products in the picture that weren't in the listing. This is a beautiful gift if you are willing to be surprised by the contents. However, I had searched for a gift that would meet the tastes of my gift recipients and that didn't happen. I feel that a contents may vary disclosure should have been included. If so, this item would warrant a five rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Fleur

customer_reviews.title: Awful products
customer_reviews.text: Every product in this basket was obviously re-packaged at the Wine Country Baskets warehouse. Some items had no expiration date and boxes were easily opened to exposed food. We tried almost all of the products and here's the result: crackers were dry and stale, chocolates tasted bitter, cookies were tasteless and crumbled to bits, hummos was a tiny individual tub that was watery and said on the label that it was not to be sold individually. The only thing about the gift basket that was remotely good was the container, which was very thin metal but looked okay. VERY disappointed in this gift and would NEVER order from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Preston

customer_reviews.title: Inedible
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift for my in-laws. The chocolates were discolored and smashed, so much so that they couldn't get them out of the paper wrappers. They said they were "inedible". The brown butter cookie was burned. This did not get me on the "nice" list with my in-laws!
customer_reviews.author: Terri G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my family and the product they received did not match than what was shown online. The snack boxes are also different.
customer_reviews.author: euph

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The price is ridiculous. The size is not what I'd pictured at all. I could have gone out and got more items and bigger items for that matter for half the price. This was a last minute gift or I would have made one myself. Definitely would not buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this basket
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the basket it had very little in it. I would not recommend this basket. I purchased it for a fund raiser. I had to open it up and add more to it because it was cheaply put together if I wasn't on a time schedule I would of returned it.
customer_reviews.author: zaw

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: 1ST review was rejected. The package delivered wasn't what was shown in the photo. This product is poor and the company should not be trusted. It was a gift for a friend so if a BOT decides to comment I'll not involve my friend in the drama. That's why I didn't return the package just beware and avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Cornpone

customer_reviews.title: I had sent the basket for Christmas and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I had sent the basket for Christmas and it was delivered to my friend with no message of whom it was from. I just found this out now :(
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: I like the presentation and the gift wrapping. This was a gift to my daughter on her first day of her career. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous Presentation!
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our Great Grandma in New York who has not been able to come out due to COVID-19 outbreak. She called last night and said it was the most beautiful gift basket she has seen in all of her life. She is 92. She raved about the presentation. “Even the bow was so eloquent and perfect” she said. Great Grandma is always hard to please and she is brutally and painfully honest about everything. She always has been. She loved this package and went on and on about it’s beauty. Good job! Thank you. I’ll be using this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Prize Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this basket along with another for our reception to give away as gifts for games we did. We paired it with some bottles of wine and it was a big hit! Winners said it was yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself for a job well done and I will be buying this again as gifts for others
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basket
customer_reviews.text: we purchased ten different baskets for our holiday luncheon; this was one of the nicest baskets.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend in her 80s who had surgery; she has raved about what a "nice gift" it was. Tasty selections, well-placed and chosen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone who was in a hotel room for two weeks. They loved it! They said they snacked on it morning noon and night depending on their need and it was wonderful.

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: Very nice basket i got it for my doctor after he delivered my baby and he really loved it

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like a good value and great selection but when you ...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a good value and great selection but when you actually opened the various things most contained a small amount, some even just 2 cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Renee Pacana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and simple gift!
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my 23 year old and she was in heaven. Perfect gift for that college kid or that someone who enjoy chocolates!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! The folks it was gifted to greatly ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! The folks it was gifted to greatly enjoyed the quality and variety.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictures except the basket
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged. Got it as a gift for someone so I’m unsure of the freshness or taste.

customer_reviews.title: Gift without gift card and delivery information was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know how the gift was as it was a gift. But it came with no card - even though I had written a card. And it says that it was handed directly to a resident and it wasn't. They left it on the front porch and didn't even ring the doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Safe choice
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and presentable gourmet gift basket. Pretty good size too. It won’t disappoint.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was prettier than expected and we loved it. My father loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift set
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. It has a great selection and my neighboors were impressed when i gave it to them.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basket!
customer_reviews.text: Great basket! Very pretty and filled just like the picture! Will purchase more in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product inside
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my brother, but he love it .

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend. She sent me a message raving how great the gift was and how much items came with it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a retirement. Only thing missing was wine- but I didn't order it with that option.

customer_reviews.title: Gave it to my Mom for Mother's Day and she loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product pictured above. Gave it to my Mom for Mother's Day and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My friends really liked this gift (as did their kids).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: "where's the wine"
customer_reviews.text: lovely gift basket I bought 1 each for both father and father in law this year on father's day, both asked "where's the wine" , just a heads up to others like me who just see a nice gift basket and don't look closer at name of basket
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! Everything I'm the box was inedible. I threw the whole box away. There's far better boxes available elsewhere.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift for Father’s Day
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Father’s Day and he loved it! A lot of the snacks are things you can’t find just anywhere and there is a lot of variety :)

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations, Mother's Day hit!
customer_reviews.text: The size, quality assortment, and beautiful presentation of this basket of goodies brought tears to my mom's eyes -- this by far exceeded expectations! Highly recommend for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for people at work. Very nice looking.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly packaging
customer_reviews.text: The basket looked great but turned out to be mostly packaging. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a gift and they were thrilled with how awesome this basket was!

customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to mixed reviews but gift basket was delivered as pictured! We were very pleased with the product, especially for the price!

customer_reviews.title: not out of the ordinary but a good gift for someone you don't really know that well
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, not out of the ordinary but a good gift for someone you don't really know that well.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my parents and they absolutely loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Was going to give it to someone and endured an ...
customer_reviews.text: Was going to give it to someone and endured an epic fail through lack of communication/ relationship short falls and had to eat it myself. It needs more food and less packaging. Really tasty stuff though, oreo sized boxes for a handful of crackers isn't so environmentally friendly.

customer_reviews.title: Good Snacks!
customer_reviews.text: The snacks were good when paired with bread and cheese and wine.

customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter. All the items were intact and up to her satisfaction

customer_reviews.title: The gift card I wrote did not accompany the gift ...
customer_reviews.text: The gift card I wrote did not accompany the gift. That was very disappointing as the recipient had no idea who it was from. She had to guess it was for me
customer_reviews.author: S. Taplin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift and my friend loved it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice price too
customer_reviews.text: Sent for friend and when opened seemed to have very large selection. Nice price too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Musgrave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to my boyfriend as a surprise gift at his New York office. He loved it and also his colleagues!! He said the items were of high quality and the variety of contents was very good. The address I filled up was incomplete, UPS corrected it and delivered 4 days earlier than expected date. I highly recommend this basket :)

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Basket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother for Mother's Day and she loved it. I did not personally see it, but if she is happy...I am very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Basket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Connoisseur basket for my uncle. He really enjoyed all the savory and delicious products. He said that the basket was wonderful and all the items were of great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Assortment of Goodies!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my folks for Christmas and they said they we quite pleased of the assortment of this basket of goodies!!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged even beautifully so, but even with the packaging it looks cheap. Off brand weird products and so not worth the price. I was embarrassed to give this to a family member.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for family so I cannot give I first hand review, however the recipients gave favourable feedback. Delivery was prompt.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Ok this was a little pricey but it was worth it! It was sent as a gift and they loved it! They loved all the goodies stashed in this basket and tasting the products. I would recommend this as a gift item, pricey but it was well enjoyed by those who got it as a gift !
customer_reviews.author: ralfie

product_meta.title: The Connoisseur Gourmet Gift Basket
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT GIFT BASKET FOR ANY OCCASION: Perfect as an anniversary basket for couples, a congratulations gift basket, college care package, or a corporate gift basket. Ideal and unique gift as a housewarming gift basket or for a retirement gift. This selection/tower of treats can be adapted to nearly every need: birthday gifts, get well soon gifts, and more
WE GUARANTEE YOU AND YOUR RECIPIENTS SATISFACTION: Wine Country Gift Baskets pours its heart into every basket. Hand assembled in the USA we give every gift our utmost care and attention

OVER 30 YEARS OF SENDING GIFT BASKETS: Making memories by giving a Wine Country Gift Baskets gift is an easy thing. We've been manufacturing and selling value-priced, quality food and wine gift baskets to consumers and businesses for over 30 years

PERSONALIZED GIFT MESSAGES ARE AVAILABLE: Personalized Messages are also available to share your customized sentiments for every situation that can arise. This heart-warming option has been included to allow you to share your custom created message with your gift recipient
A WHOLESOME GIFT DELIVERED: Send this beautiful basket to your recipient at home, school ,work and more, it's the Perfect gift for any occasion or just a delicious way to stay connected

PRIME PRESENTATION: We have taken gift-giving to a complete new level. Each detail in the package is designed to make your gift-giving even more thrilling and extra delicious. Our beautiful presentation will make this gift a memorable one. Make Wine Country Gift Baskets your destination for special and unique gourmet gifts online that are sure to delight. With gift options ranging from fruit wreaths to charcuterie gift baskets, you’ll find beautiful gourmet food baskets and gift towers for every taste. Festive holiday gifts as well as all occasion gifts are available, and you can even shop for
